sale.title: Sale
sale.description: Only fresh and relevant offers for the sale of real estate in Montenegro with different prices for every taste. Professional approach and legal support.

hero_section.title: Rent and sale of apartments and houses in Montenegro
hero_section.description: The best offers for the sale of real estate in Montenegro with different prices for every taste. When buying a property, you will receive a residence permit as a gift.

about_page.title: We strive and develop
about_page.text: Our company MonteSale always tries to satisfy the needs of any client coming to Montenegro as much as possible. Our employees have extensive experience in real estate, legal matters, immigration, as well as providing various types of services, which you can find on our website. We will always be happy to assist in any matters relating to your stay on the territory of Montenegro. We are waiting for you in this beautiful warm and sunny country.
